tra package¶

tra.features module¶

Feature class for a Circle

class tra.features.Exponential(points)[source]¶

Feature Class for an exponential curve y=a*x**k +b

min_points = 3¶
points_distance(points)[source]¶
class tra.features.Feature[source]¶

Bases: object

Abstract class that represents a feature to be used with the RansacFeature class in tra.ransac module

min_points¶

The minimum points required to compute the feature (e.g. Circle.min_points = 3)

min_points

Min number of points to define the feature

points_distance(points)[source]¶

This function implements a method to compute the distance of points from the feature

Parameters:points – a numpy array of points the distance must be computed of
Returns:the computed distance of the points from the feature
Return type:distance

tra.ransac module¶

class tra.ransac.RansacFeature(feature, max_it=100, inliers_percent=0.6, threshold=100, dst=10)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for feature detection inside images and videos with the RANSAC algorithm

feature¶

the feature class

max_it¶

Max Number of iterations for the RANSAC loop

inliers_percent¶

percentage of inliers over total points.Used for stop criteria in the RANSAC loop

threshold¶

Value of threshold used after the image normalization (can be an integer from 1 to 254)

dst¶

the distance of the inliers pixels from the feature (i.e. a pixel is considered an inlier if its distance is < dst)

compute_feature(pixels)[source]¶

This method look for the feature inside a set of points

Parameters:points – the set of points.
Returns:The detected feature object percent: The percentage of “fitness” (i.e inliers/total_points) of the feature detected
in the image
Return type:feature
image_search(image)[source]¶

This method look for the feature inside a grayscale image

Parameters:image – the image where to detect the circle.
Returns:The detected feature object percent: The percentage of “fitness” (i.e inliers/total_points) of the feature detected
in the image
Return type:feature
Raises:ValueError – If the thresholded image is completely empty (all pixels intensities == 0, a ValueError is raised)
video_processing(videofile)[source]¶
